dialogues.text: Close your eyes, baby.  Keep 'em closed.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: BEN GRIMM stands front and center.  Not the Thing.  But B GRIMM.  A normal man.  He smiles wide, shaking his head.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You surprised?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Now we PULL BACK to reveal DEBBIE and BEN on a SCREEN.  T Thing watches the old videotape.  He smiles sadly at his life.  He mouths the words -- he knows this tape by heart

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yeah I'm surprised.  Surprised the fire department didn't shut this down.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ON SCREEN: the handheld camera whips around, revealing... SURPRISE PARTY.  Full of people.  Ben Grimm is a popular On screen: Reed hugs Ben.  They pose for pictures togethe

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: God.  I was good looking.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We hear the party sing "HAPPY BIRTHDAY."  Debbie kisses B Thing's eyes start to mist.  On screen: Ben blows out candles.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What did you wish for, honey?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I already got it.  Everything I want.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: As they kiss, a tear runs down Thing's cheek.  The tape e and he sits in darkness for a beat.  A long, lonely beat.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ben stalks the halls, slipping into his ragged trenchcoat As he passes a crossroads, he sees a strange sight: REED'S HAND is TIED to a latch in the wall.  His ARM is STREEETCHED THIN, spanning around the corner.  Ben just shakes his head, keeps moving.  And we FOLLOW REED'S ARM. UP THE HALL...ROUND A CORNER...DOWN ANOTHER HALL.  The muscles and tissue STRETCH, going taut.  Finally, we reac REED.  He steps slowly.  He holds a digital TAPE-MEASURE his other hand, measuring distance.  His skin STREEETCHES His face tightens, pained.  We hear the faint SQUEAK of h skin.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Damn, Stretch!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Reed turns his head around, seeing JOHNNY come down the h

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: How far's that rubber bend?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Reed keeps moving, slowly.  His muscles and tendons labor

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That's what I'm trying to calculate.  And it's not rubber.  It's muscle, tendon.  I seem to have the ability to manipulate the malleability of my molecular structure and redistribute my density to --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Right, whatever, have fun.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: And Johnny is GONE, ducking under Reed's arm into --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Johnny opens a cupboard, pulls out some JIFFY POP.  It st to POP in his hand, the bag swelling.  He casually turns TV, flipping to...the X- GAMES.  The Jiffy Pop swells, re to blow.  He rips it open, eats popcorn, and watches the games: Cool stunts, hot girls.  Johnny's brow furrows, a thought forming, a mischievous smile on his lips.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A FIGURE exits, wearing that ragged trenchcoat and fedora Ben disappears into the dark night, and we CUT TO --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Dark.  Lights flicker.  Steam rises through the grates. shadow emerges.  Ben.  He heads toward O'DONNEL'S PUB, a classic Brooklyn tavern.  Neon sign.  Music, life inside. Ben pulls his hat low, turns up his collar, and squeezes through the door into --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A big photo of Ben Grimm in his astronaut heyday occupies place over the bar.  Ben enters, and the bar goes SILENT. moves through the crowd.  People clear out of the way. Ben reaches the bar.  He sits on a stool, and CRUNCH!  SM The stool SNAPS like a toothpick.  He hits the ground har Glasses shake.  A few PATRONS smile, laugh softly.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That's not funny!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They go silent.  They drop bills onto tables, filing out, scared of this monster.  ERNIE works the bar.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hey, that's Ben Grimm there, the first mook from Brooklyn to go to outer space, so pay him some respect!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: But the patrons keep filing out.  Ben looks down, weary.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ernie.  Sorry for killing your business.  I'll take the usual, then I'm out... Better make it a double.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ernie heads for the booze.  Ben gives a sad shake of his head.  Then he notices...one lone patron at the end of th bar.  A beautiful young woman nursing a drink.  Meet ALIC MASTERS.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Who killed the party?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She turns to him, unafraid.  He notices her blank stare, of focus, and white cane.  Alicia is blind.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Make it a triple.  On the house, Benny.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ben takes his drink, but SMASH!  His grip shatters the gl spilling all over himself.  He smiles ruefully.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: If there's a God, she hates me.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He grabs a bar-rag to dry off.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I don't think She's real big on hate.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You wouldn't say that, if you could see me.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She knocks back her drink, grabs her cane, steps toward B

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Can I...?  See you...?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ben doesn't say anything.  A little unnerved by this woma

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's okay, I won't bite... (feeling his arm) ...not that I could.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She puts a hand on his face -- something in her tone and gentle touch allows Ben to let her.  She smiles softly.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Such a sad face... You know, sometimes being different isn't a bad thing.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Trust me, this ain't one of those times.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She smiles softly, takes her cane, and starts to head out

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: See you round, Benny...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Right as she hits the door, over her shoulder --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm Alicia, by the way.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ben watches her disappear.  He sees a few people staring. lowers his head, turns back to the bar, and finds a new drink, in a steel MARTINI SHAKER.  He knocks it back.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Lights twinkle.  A MAITRE D' leads us through fancy digs. Heads turn, whispers flutter.  SUE steps out, joining... Victor at a prime table.  He pulls out her chair, wearing gloves.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Thank you for coming out to see me.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She nods, a little self-conscious.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You said it was urgent.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It is.  There's something we need to talk about.  Something I need to ask you...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sue senses where this is going, and she cuts it short.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (slow, careful) Victor, wait, slow down a second.  I want you to know I appreciate everything you've done for me, but I just don't --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Susan.  What are you doing?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He is cold as ice.  If he's hurt, he'll never show it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You think I brought you here to talk about us?  Please.  This is business. (leaning forward, intense) I need to know: how close is Reed to finding to a cure?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She pauses.  Then:

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He's working round the clock.  But the data needs to be tested, analyzed before --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Same old Reed.  All analysis, no action.  Wasn't that the problem with you two?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She holds tight, keeping cool.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: If these molecules aren't stable, they could make us worse, maybe even kill us.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Then why is Reed dragging his feet?  Maybe he likes having his prize specimen under glass... (closer, cruel) It's ironic, isn't it?  You're finally the perfect woman for him...because you're his science project.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The words sting.  She can't help but hear some truth in t

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Please don't make this personal --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh, I think you already have.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Victor, we can't do anything until the research is ready.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Victor's fist CLENCHES -- metal SFX.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: "We," huh?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Victor SCREECHES his chair back, PUSHING the table so har that he SPILLS water.  Heads turn, all eyes on Sue.  Vict gets close to her, too close, a hand on her shoulder.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Don't forget who you work for, Susan.  So get to work.  And do your job.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He walks out.  As he goes, he slips the engagement ring o of his pocket.  He crushes the diamond to dust, leaves th dust in an ashtray, and disappears into the night. Sue sits embarrassed.  She slowly...disappears.  People g She walks out, invisible, save for her clothes, which DRI through the air.  At a TABLE FULL OF BUSINESSMEN --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I wish my wife would disappear.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The other men laugh, but WHHM!  The man's wine SPILLS int his LAP!  Sue walks out.  The restaurant is left buzzing. Lights twinkle.  And we FADE OUT.  A beat.  Then we CRASH

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The X games in full effect: A maze of mountainous dirt hi and ramps...where MOTO-BIKES launch into the air to the delight of 20,000 fans.  The Riders spin and flip, perfor aerial acrobatics on their 250CC motor bikes.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: And now, ladies and gentlemen, we have a special guest for you... Johnny Storm of the Fantastic Four!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: JOHNNY emerges, wearing his blue uniform, waving to the crowd.  He steps up to the pit where RIDERS prep.  He beelines to RONNIE RENNER.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hey, Ronnie Renner!  I'm a big fan.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ronnie gives a tight nod.  He doesn't like being upstaged this circus freak. The other bikers approach.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Heard you like to ride.  Wanna take her for a spin?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He motions to his BIKE.  Johnny eyes this mean machine.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Come on, bro.  I'll teach you some tricks...if you can keep up.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We PUSH IN on Johnny, his ego getting stoked, as we CUT T

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ronnie jams down the track, kicking dirt back at Johnny.  Johnny now wears a MOTOCROSS OUTFIT over his uniform, wit the number "004" on the back and a small 4 over his heart Ronnie hits the first hill, and CATCHES AIR, FLIPPING HIG

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A rock-solid double-flip!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The CROWD goes wild.  Now it's Johnny's turn.  He hits th hill and pulls the exact same move.  With even more heigh

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Look at that lift, ladies and gentlemen!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Johnny sticks the landing.  The crowd swells.  Ronnie tightens, pulls his throttle harder, taking the next jump and...MAKING AN INSANE MOVE, CORKSCREWING IN THE AIR!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Frontside 360!  He's totally flat and whipped!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He lands clean.  The crowd is ready to explode.  Johnny R his engine, his body starting to STEAM, adrenaline burnin He hits the hill, and pulls an even gnarlier SPIN!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Whoa!  That's a...what is that?  A 720?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Johnny lands.  The crowd roars.  Ronnie bears down on the last hill.  He leans over his handlebars.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He's going for a Kiss of Death!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ronnie hits the hill, pulls this JAW-DROPPING DEATH-DEFYI STUNT!  The crowd is deafening!  Ronnie smiles.  And...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: JOHNNY SPEEDS FASTER, FASTER.  Trails of FLAME start to streak off his back!  He RACES LIKE A ROCKET UP THE HILL!

dialogues.speaker: FLAMING BLUR
dialogues.text: And now for the really impressive part: Johnny's bike sta to drop, but JOHNNY KEEPS RISING!  He FLAMES ON, spiralin upward!  For a few seconds, he's actually...almost...flyi

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (hand over mic) Is he......flying?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A beat.  Time suspended.  And...WHHM!  He PLUMMETS back d LANDS on his bike in mid-air!  And sticks a perfect landi maybe even kicking a little dirt up at Ronnie.  Johnny swerves to a stop, with a "holy shit" look on his face. the hell just happened??

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Unbelievable, ladies and gentlemen!  You've just seen the first...the first...TORCHFLIGHT!  The McTORCH!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A new name is born.  The crowd goes berserk.  Standing ovation.  Riders rush up to Johnny.  Kenny sees his bike: THE SEAT MELTED, WHEELS BURNED OFF.  Johnny smiles.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: My bad.  Sorry about that. (a glance to Ronnie) Thanks for the lesson, bro.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: HOT GIRLS swarm.  As Johnny gets swallowed by fans, we se scary thing flicker in his eyes: the birth of a star.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sue stands alone, sifting through piles of mail.  She foc on one piece of mail that she's holding.  Her hand begins disappear and then the envelope slowly begins to disappea well.  Sue smiles at the success.  Intrigued.  Quiet:

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That's new...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Reed enters -- overworked, unshaved.  He keeps his head d preoccupied.  Sue shifts focus.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Have you read these...?  From all over.  People want us to fight crimes...  save their kids...solve their problems... (no response from Reed) ...when we can't even solve our own.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She puts the letters down, steps closer to Reed.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Reed.  How close are we to a cure?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No way to know.  Without more tests, experiments.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She considers.  Victor's words echo in her head.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We're not specimens, we're patients.  This isn't just another science project to you, is it...?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Reed looks up, a little surprised.  He opens his mouth, b

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: NO...NO...NO FREAKIN' WAY!!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: CRASH!  BANG!  Ben stalks around the room, furious.  Reed Sue rush in.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: BEN!  What?  What's going on!?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ben points to the wall-sized TV: the ESPN MOTO X GAMES.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: So what can you tell us about the outfit?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: REVEAL: JOHNNY standing next to an X GAMES REPORTER.  He peeling off the burned remains of his motocross outfit, revealing his FF UNIFORM, with a "4" STITCHED ONTO THE CH Behind them, STEP UP RIDERS launch their MOTO-BIKES off h 18' high mountains of dirt, thirty feet in the air.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Not too much, but I will say that it's all weather and no leather.  Kind of Armani meets Astronaut.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ben, Sue, and Reed stare at the wall-sized TV.  Mouths ag

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He didn't.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh, he did.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What did he do to the uniform?!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She turns to Reed, who gives a sheepish shrug, and peels his labcoat revealing a "4" stitched onto his chest too.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He talked me into it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: So what are your superhero names?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I go by the Human Torch.  The ladies call me Torch.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What about the rest of the team?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Johnny hadn't really thought about them.  He spitballs:

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Uh, we call my sister the invisible girl...the Invisible Girl.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Girl...?!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That's easy to remember.  And Reed Richards?  He's the leader.  So what's he?  Mr. Fantastic?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Well, I wouldn't say he's the leader.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Reed shrugs.  He doesn't hate the name.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Could be worse.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Case in point: a photo of Ben fills the TV.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What about this one?  What do you call this Thing?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Johnny smiles, looking right into camera.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That's it.  Just The Thing.  We would have gone with The Rock, but it was taken.  And "Thing" pretty much sums it up.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A LAUGH from the studio audience.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (matter-of-fact) Okay.  I'm gonna go kill him now.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He turns to go.  Reed wraps an arm around Ben.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ben!  Slow down a second and --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He sees a photo of himself on screen.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Is it true what they say?  That he can expand any part of his anatomy?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Actually, between us, I think he's got some problems staying rigid.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (finishing his thought to Ben) ...wait for me...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Which may explain why this woman's not smiling.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They put up a shot of Susan.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm driving.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Dude.  That's my sister.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Thing rounds the corner.  Sees a crowd of girls lined near a red PORSCHE parked out front...with "TORCHED" on t plates.  Ben slows down, smiles.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Johnny and the Hot Babe exit, signing autographs for girl the line.  Sue and Reed approach, glare like angry parent Johnny finds the Valet, who looks ill...his car is gone.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (looking around) Where's my ride?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Valet blows his whistle...and a 4 X 4 solid cube of R JUNK METAL slides down the street and stops at the curb i front of Johnny.  The Valet timidly holds out the keys...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What the?!  Is that my --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Before he can finish, Johnny gets PELTED IN THE HEAD with license plate.  It rattles to the ground, face up. Johnny rubs the sting out of his head.  Looks up and sees in the distance, dusting off his hands.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (shouting: to Ben) You're gonna pay for that, Pebbles. (seeing Sue) What?!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You gave us names?  What are you, the "face" of the Fantastic Four now?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ben marches up.  Hands balled into fists.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's about to be a broken face.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: This isn't permanent, Johnny.  We need to be careful until we're normal again.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What if some of us don't want to be "normal" again?  We didn't all turn into monsters like --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ben reels back a FIST the size of an anvil.  Stops himsel Instead of attacking, he starts to walk off. Johnny hurls a FIREBALL that SMACKS Ben in the back of th head.  Ben stops.  Turns around more shocked than hurt.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Did you just --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ben gets hit with ANOTHER FIREBALL.  This time in the fac

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Okay, that's it, tinkerbell!  You want to fly?  Fly.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ben charges like a bull, fist cocked back, and...Reed ste in the way!  Too late!  WHAMM!  Ben's fist PUNCHES INTO REED'S CHEST, which INDENTS.  Reed's BACK EXPANDS with Be fist, PUNCHING into Johnny, launching Johnny off his feet BAM!  Johnny SLAMS into a moving ADVERTISING TRUCK, with BURGER KING flame-broiled WHOPPER on the side.  WHOOSH! leaves a flaming imprint on the all-beef patty. The crowd stands stunned.  So do Reed and Sue.  Cameras p Johnny slowly pulls himself up.  The paint on the truck begins to bubble around his hand.  Beaten, bruised, he stands.  Heating up.  Both his hands are now flaming fist fury.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Let's see if we can get blood from a stone.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He and Ben lock eyes, with a block of sidewalk between th High Noon.  They start to RUN toward each other... When they are almost within range, Sue STEPS BETWEEN THEM stops them both in their tracks with just a look.  Like a mom:

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You two need a time-out.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Blockhead started it!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ben just stalks off.  The crowd clears, scared.  A PAPARA snaps a picture.  Ben GRABS his camera, and flicks the le

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sue looks at Johnny, more disappointed than angry.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Damn it, Johnny.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She goes after Ben, leaving Reed and Johnny on the sidewa

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You need to control yourself and think before you --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Act.  Here we go again.  Reed, what if we got these gifts for a reason?  What if we have some, you know...like, calling?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A higher calling like getting girls and making money?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Johnny nods, totally missing the sarcasm.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Is there any higher?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Reed looks at him, disgusted.  Johnny waves to the crowd, hand flaming.  People SHRIEK, snap pictures.  Johnny smil Reed.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: This is who we are Reed.  Accept it.  Or better yet: enjoy it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Johnny steps into the sea of fans.  Reed stands alone.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sue wades through the throng of New Yorkers.  Tries to ca up with Ben...whose presence parts the crowd like Moses.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ben!  Slow down...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ben glances sideways at her, doesn't stop.  She catches u

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He didn't mean it.  You know Johnny.  He's always been a hothead --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's not him.  It's them. (pointing to crowd) I can't live like this.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Just give Reed a little more time. You know how he works -- analyzing every little step before he takes one --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's easy for you to be patient.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No, it's not.  I thought I was done waiting for Reed... We're all in this together now, Ben.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He slows down, gets closer, intense.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Together?  Look at me, Susie.  You got no idea what I'd give...to be invisible.  Your nightmare...is my dream.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She opens her mouth, but has no response.  She doesn't kn his depth of pain.  As he disappears into the alley, we C

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The news plays on the TV.  Head Banker Ned Cecil freezes screen on an image of...THE THING.  He turns to Victor, w sits with the rest of the bankers.  Cold, sterile environment.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: This is how you "turn things around"?  These freaks are on the front page and your company's in the obituaries.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Victor has a larger bandage on his face now.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I have a plan to use their publicity for --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Victor, stop.  The bank's lost enough already.  This isn't a negotiation.  It's a notification.  We're pulling out.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A cold, silent beat.  Victor leans forward.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You need to look long-term here.  Without risk, there's no --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Reward.  We all know the sales pitch, Vic.  And frankly, we're done buying... Gentlemen.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He motions to his men.  They all stand.  Victor is the lo man sitting.  PUSH IN on Victor's face, his inner rage palpable.  A few quick surges of electricity emanate from body.  This man is getting stronger, more electric.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: After hours.  The floor is slick with water -- puddles in every direction.  Ned Cecil comes out of the elevator, heading for his car.  As he goes, the structure lights st to flicker.  Ned looks up, watches the lights go out one one, furthest to closest.  He looks around.  Unnerved by darkness.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hello...?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A hanging beat.  Victor steps out from shadows.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (relieved, almost) Von Doom?  Gave me a little shock.  No hard feelings, right?  Nothing personal.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Victor says nothing.  Ned keeps going.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You know, you could always move back to Latvura, start fresh.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He mispronounces Latveria, dripping condescension.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Maybe that's where you belong, back in the "old country."

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That does it.  A surge of electricity courses through Vic His eyes narrow, and the electricity crackles down his le THE GROUND.  The electric spark hits the water and...

dialogues.speaker: ELECTRIC CURRENTS RACE ACROSS THE GROUND, SLITHERING
dialogues.text: LIGHTNING-FAST ACROSS THE WATER (like deadly electric snakes), heading straight for Ned.  His eyes go wide.  An

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: NED IS ELECTROCUTED!  His body spasms.  THUD!  He slumps, dead.  Smoke rises from his body.  Victor stands, power swelling. For the first time, his SCAR SPLITS OPEN, revealing a MET GLOW beneath the skin.  He remains scary calm.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's pronounced Latveria. (looking down at the dead body) This meeting's over, Ned.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Victor walks away, the final lights going to DARKNESS.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Victor enters, still adrenalized.  He turns to the light switch, and the lights come on.  He approaches his screen and the monitors flicker to life.  His powers are growing One MONITOR rolls the news.  IMAGES of the FANTASTIC FOUR Victor leans closer, and the VOLUME automatically goes up

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ...the Fantastic Four put on quite a show last night.  They landed in every major headline in the northern hemisphere.  In related news...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: An IMAGE of VICTOR on screen.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Reports have surfaced that Von Doom Industries may be filing for bankruptcy.  You may remember that it was Victor Von Doom who...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Victor turns away from the screen.  The volume goes down. focuses his eyes on REED. Leonard enters, stepping closer, seeing the faint flicker VICTOR'S METALLIC SCAR.  His eyes narrow, concerned.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sir, is everything okay?  What happened to your...?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Victor keeps his eyes on the screen, totally engrossed.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (under breath, seething) Reed... He got what he wanted... (looking at Sue) Everything he wanted...he took from me.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He leans ever closer, so the static starts to swallow Ree A hard, deadly beat.  Victor's eyes narrow, zooming into...REED'S RESEARCH: SLIDES on the wall.  He zooms int key words: DANGER, UNSTABLE IONS, MUTATION, OVERLOAD.  And Victor gi a slow, thin smile.  A new plan forming.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Now I'm going to take it back.  Piece by bloody piece...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: His fist clenches.  We hear METALLIC SFX.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Reed enters the room carrying a stack of boxes that no no man could balance.  But he is not normal.  His arms are wrapped around the boxes five times over -- like human tw He stops short, and drops the boxes when he sees... VICTOR overseeing a group of TECHNICIANS.  They are boxin Reed's work -- all of his equipment, research.  Victor we a bandage, covering his scar.  Reed eyes a glint of METAL

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Victor, are you...are you okay?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Victor turns away.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Don't worry about me.  Worry about yourself.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Reed looks around, seeing his lab turned inside out.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What are you doing here?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What I should have done a long time ago.  Applications and patents, Reed.  This all belongs to me.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Reed reaches out, grabbing a folder from a box.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: But I'm not done with the machine --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Which is precisely the point. Analysis is over.  It's time for action.  My men could have mass- produced this by now.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Reed shakes his head, defending himself.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Mass-produced?  This isn't a toaster.  You have no idea how it works.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Victor pulls the folder from Reed's hand, and whips out t intricate DIAGRAM of the MACHINE.  He points to parts:

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Re-create the storm, invert the polarity here, reverse the mutation there.  Don't talk to me like I'm some schoolboy.  I've got the same Phd you do.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Reed is a little surprised that Victor is so familiar wit his machine.  He points to a SECURE CHAMBER on the bluepr

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The storm needs to be handled exactly right, or it could make our mutations worse, much worse, maybe even kill us...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Victor slows.  Is Reed getting to him?  Or giving him ide

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Victor, please.  We need time to verify the data... We can't afford any mistakes -- there's only enough ions for two or three attempts.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Victor considers.  He seems to enjoy watching Reed dangle

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Reed.  I'm not asking permission. (a final verdict) We'll build it, while you check the specs.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Victor walks out.  Reed looks unsure, as we CUT TO --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The SHIELDS slowly rise.  FIVE TECHNICIANS go to work.  T wear the VDI jackets.  Reed watches, worried. Sue enters.  She sees the shields, the technicians, the V logo.  And she is deeply worried.  She steps over to Reed Sparks fly behind them.  Drills scream.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Can I talk to you?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sue steps into the office, followed by Reed.  Quiet, urge

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Don't let Victor push you into making a mistake --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He was going to take away all my data, equipment --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Better than your life.  Victor's not the one who has to get into that thing.  We are.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Reed starts to snap, losing his studied cool.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Which is why I'm working twenty hours a day, checking every variable --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Every variable but yourself.  You don't eat, sleep.  You can't live in your head like --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (finally losing it) I'm not the only one in there.  I got you, Vic, Ben, Johnny, all rattling around in there.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sue stands there, shocked by his outburst.  A beat.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: So clear it out.  Get out of your head.  Get out of here...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He looks at her, knowing what she means.  Where she means

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ben nearly knocks people over as he stomps down the stree mind tossing and turning.  People stare, point.  A LITTLE GIRL and FRIEND run up to him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Mister, Mister!  Please help me!  My kitty is stuck in a tree.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She gestures to a tree next to Ben.  Looks up.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Please save Miss Lucy.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ben rolls his eyes.  Looks up.  Considers climbing the tr but thinks better of it.  He has another idea... Ben grabs the tree with one hand, and starts shaking the out of it.  MEEEEEEOOOOOOOWWWWRRRRRRR!!!! The cat falls into frame.  At the last instant, Ben stick out his hand and the cat lands safely in his palm.  He ha the cat to the girl.  Barely acknowledges her profuse tha He just moves on.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ben passes a window in a gallery, and almost misses A LAR SCULPTURE of his bust. He stops, steps back to take a look.  It's exquisitely rendered, capturing not just brute physicality, but the haunting anguish in his eyes.  Ben is amazed, and touched but...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (under breath) Eyebrows are a little big...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A beat.  He stares at these images of himself.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I figured the only way to get you here was to stick that in the window.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He turns to see...ALICIA in the doorway.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: How'd you know it was me?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm blind, not deaf.  Wanna come in?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He steps toward her.  But he sees...a PARTY in the back p of the gallery.  Ben pauses, a little insecure.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm not really dressed for a party.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Relax, it's casual.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No, I mean...I'm a little...dusty...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She smiles, a thought forming, as we CUT TO --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: WHOOSH!  A SCULPTOR'S HOSE sprays a thin stream of water BEN.  Alicia cleans Ben with her hands, using thin CARVIN CHISELS for his cracks.  Intricate, intimate work. Ben enjoys every moment.  He eyes a couple, large PUPPETS the corner.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Those yours too?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: My step-dad's.  I'm strictly into stone.  I was wondering when you'd walk by.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You know, you could'a run an ad in the personals.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: "Sensual blind chick seeks three-ton, rock-hard he-man for deep spiritual relationship."

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: This ain't permanent.  My friend Reed's working on a cure...I think.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She gets closer, running her hands across his arm.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Bennie.  You feel pretty good as is.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ben bristles.  He doesn't want to stay this way.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You don't know what it's like out there.  Walking around like some kind of circus freak.  People staring, whispering --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I wouldn't know anything about that.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I mean...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Tell me.  When you grew up in Brooklyn, how many astronauts did you know? (a beat) You went your own way then.  You didn't listen to people.  So why start now...?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: As he ponders that, we hear a CROWD SWELLING on the CUT T

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Fans swarm JOHNNY.  He signs autographs, poses for pictur Then his eyes move to...an incredibly long stretch LIMO. tinted window rolls down.  Victor's face emerges.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Need a ride, Johnny?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Johnny climbs in, sees...three impossibly gorgeous MODELS

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A few fans.  Hope you don't mind.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Gotta take care of the fans, right?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He smiles, sitting down in the middle of them.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Look, I built my business knowing what people want.  And right now, the people want you.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Johnny eyes the models, all lusting.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: And we don't want to let the people down now, do we?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No we don't.  Which is why we need to strike while the iron's hot.  I'm talking action figures, videogames, sponsors --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Videogames?  You serious?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Victor nods, knowing he has Johnny on the hook.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You talk to Reed and Sue about this?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Johnny.  Let's be honest here.  Ben, Reed, Sue.  Good people, all.  But stars? (shaking his head, a beat) I don't want to break up the band, but you're the one they want.  Don't you think it's time to go solo...?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Victor subtly nods to the models.  They envelop Johnny.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Take the car for a spin.  Think about it.  Is this the life you want?  Or would you rather live in Reed's lab...?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The car stops.  Victor gets out.  He stands on the paveme As he shuts the door, we see the women climbing onto John The door shuts, and... WHHHMMMPF!  The windows all suddenly STEAM UP!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: STARS on the ceiling.  A VOICE drones about the galaxy. the LAST ROW, we find: Reed and Sue.  Reed is thinking ab work.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I could get Ben to tap into the Baxter's main power to generate enough voltage --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Reed.  Shh.  Just be quiet.  And look up.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He slowly looks up.  The stars seem to calm him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Remember our first date here...?  God, I was so nervous.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You were?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Of course I was.  I'd read all your papers on bioethics.  Some of them two times just so I'd have something to say to you.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Reed smiles softly, thinking back.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You know, I bribed the projectionist ten bucks to keep it open late?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I gave him twenty.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They laugh.  Sue looks up to the stars.  Quiet:

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I didn't want that night to end.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Reed looks at her.  Wrestles with a decision.  Then quiet

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sue, you were right.  It wasn't complicated.  I just wasn't ready to be...to become... (a beat) You can be a little intimidating.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She knows.  He trails off.  Sue looks at him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You always talked about how you liked the kind of man who could approach you...speak his mind.  One who wasn't afraid to tell you what he wanted.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I did.  I did, Reed...but I wanted you to be that man.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Someone SHUSHES them.  They slump down further.  Closer.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: When I walked out, I waited ten minutes outside your door.  Ten.  Waiting for you to come find me.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Why didn't you say something?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That would have kinda defeated the purpose.  And Reed... (closer, emotional) I'm saying it now.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Their eyes lock.  A heated beat.  No more secrets.  Their faces are close.  A kiss is coming.  Closer, closer.  Sue disappears.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (quiet, playful) Come find me.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Reed tentatively leans into the kiss, and...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That's my nose, genius... These are my lips.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Reed's face is SQUEEZED on both sides by Sue's invisible hands.  She pulls him into a KISS.  Lips touch.  Soft, tender.  Stars twinkle.  And we slowly DISSOLVE TO --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ben and Alicia step out together.  The crowd quiets, turn A few whispers flutter.  Alicia leans close to Ben, and s her arm into his.  The party goes back to normal.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Look around.  I'll get us drinks.  They always let blind girls cut the line.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She walks off.  He watches her go.  The way her hair move The lines of her neck.  The light on her skin.  This woma the most beautiful thing Ben has ever seen.  He's falling hard. Ben steps through the crowd.  The swanky guests give stra smiles, polite.  Ben is starting to feel comfortable here He keeps his eyes on Alicia, who talks to guests.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ben hangs back, happy to watch her.  A few patrons pass h thinking he's just an inanimate statue.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I don't know about this one.  It lacks a certain...realism.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ben keeps his eyes on Alicia.  He overhears two BOHEMIAN GIRLS, who assume he's a statue.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She's always had a thing for runaways and strays, but this is ridiculous.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I know.  Did she really think these sculptures would sell?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Like anybody would want this thing in their house.  That girl's a one-woman charity.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ben just stands there, frozen.  His eyes dart around the room, paranoid now.  Aware of people staring, laughing. glances at Alicia, who giggles at something else.  Ten seconds ago, this would have been dreamy.  Now it's damni We stay with Alicia, who cuts through the crowd, emerging where she left Ben.  She has a PITCHER of wine in hand fo him.  But Ben is gone.  She looks disappointed, hearing h heavy FOOTSTEPS get softer and softer in the distance.  THUNDER booms on the CUT TO --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A pitstop in Queens.  Heavy RAIN swims down windows.  BEN sits at the COUNTER, with his hat pulled low, coat tight. Nobody sits within four chairs of him.  He sips coffee in metal bowl.  A long beat.  Then...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: This seat taken?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ben turns to see...VICTOR.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What are you doing here?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm worried about you.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: About me?  How sweet.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Come on.  Let me buy you something to eat.  Looks like you could use the company.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ben considers.  A man deeply alone.  A beat.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Victor and Ben sit in a window booth.  A waitress sets a foothigh stack of pancakes in front of Ben, removes huge plates he's just cleared.  Victor's aware of the other customers in the diner staring at Ben.  Ben burps: it rat the plates.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 'Scuse me.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I know it can't be easy.  Life hasn't changed that much for Reed, Sue and Johnny.  At least they can go out in public.  But for you?  People staring. Whispering behind your back...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: If you're trying to cheer me up you're doing a helluva job --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm just saying, I know what it's like to lose something you love.  To see it slip away, and know it's never coming back.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Thing shoves a huge piece of pie in his mouth.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Reed's gonna fix me up --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: For your sake I hope you're right.  I'm sorry if that sounds a little skeptical.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Skeptical...?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ben doesn't trust him.  But Victor is hitting pressure points.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Look, he's a brilliant man, we should trust he's working as hard as he can.  You're his best friend.  So what possible reason could he have for taking his time? (a beat) I mean, other than getting close to Sue?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Off The Thing: a seed of doubt has been planted.  He can' help but find truth in the words.  And we CUT TO --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Reed and Sue return, laughing quietly, bodies close.  Ree turns on the lights, and they flinch when they see...BEN. sits waiting, scowling.  They stop laughing immediately.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yeah, I have that effect on people.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The construction of the TRANSFORMATION CHAMBER is complet The Technicians are gone now.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ben --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh, you remember my name do you?  You happen to remember what you swore to do with every breath in your body?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We're working as hard as we can --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yeah.  I can tell.  Victor was right.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He motions to Reed and Sue together.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Come on, this is nothing.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sue looks a little hurt.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Glad "nothing" could take you away from your work.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ben, I don't know if this thing'll change us back or make us worse.  I need you to be patient for a little while longe--

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He POKES his finger into Reed's chest, which INDENTS arou it like the Pillsbury Doughboy.  Ben pushes Reed back.  H

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Look at me, Reed.  Look at me!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He grabs Reed's face, his fingers INDENTING the skin.  He THROWS Reed back.  Reed slams down to the ground.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I am looking.  That's why I can't make a mistake!  I've got to get it right, and it's not right yet!  We need to test this.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ben shakes his head, looking down at Reed.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I spent my whole life protecting you, from the schoolyard to the stars.  For what?  So you could play Twister with your girlfriend while I'm the freak of the week?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Reed tries to stand, but Ben KNOCKS him back.  Reed slams into the wall, and stays down this time.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ben!  Stop it!  Or I'll stop it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She starts to raise her hands to throw force-fields.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Stay out of this Susie.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: As Ben turns to her, Reed takes this opportunity to WRAP up like a python.  They struggle.  Ben runs back into a w to shake Reed.  Their faces are close, heated.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Good thing you're flexible enough to watch your own back.  'Cause you're on your own now.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ben seems to relax and Reed lets go.  Ben walks out.  Sue comes to Reed's side.  He's bleeding.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm OK.  Just go, go after him.  Stop him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She heads out.  Reed slowly stands.  He looks at the transformation machine.  It's not ready.  But...Reed step toward it.  As he walks, his image goes grainy in --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Victor gets closer to his screens, watching Reed's every step.  This is what Victor has been waiting for.  His scr flicker with static -- he's too close, but he can't pull back.  He sees: REED TURNS ON THE MACHINE.  Hits a countd And he grabs his UNIFORM...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sue hustles down the long hall.  Ben turns a corner, pass the elevators, heading toward a FREIGHT ELEVATOR.  She ge there too late.  Doors close, going down.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ben pounds across the lobby.  He sees Johnny coming in.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Christmas come early!  Check it out!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He holds up an ACTION FIGURE of BEN: a horribly bloated b topped by a tiny pinhead.  Johnny pushes a button and --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: IT'S CLOBBERIN' TIME!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: WITH ONE ARM, Ben shoves Johnny into a wall.  With his ot hand, Ben grabs the toy and SMASHES it into the wall, inc from Johnny's head.  The toy lodges into the plaster.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hey!  That's a prototype!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Go back to the drawing board.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He strides away.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: DING.  Sue speeds out of the elevator.  No sign of Ben. runs into...JOHNNY who shakes off the encounter.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Johnny?  Did you see Ben?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yeah, for the last time, I hope.  I'm done with this freak show.  I'm moving back to the real world.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Is that what you call it?  "Real"?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: At least it beats living in a lab like somebody's science project.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: This hits home.  Sue is quiet.  Johnny turns to go.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Johnny, slow down.  Think.  You know mom didn't raise us to --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Look around, sis!  She's not here.  So you can stop talking to me like I'm your little boy --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: As soon as you stop acting like one.  Come on, you're smarter than this.  You think those people out there care about you?  You're just a fad to them.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He pulls away from her, taking a step out the door.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Let's try something new: you live your life.  And I'll live mine. (beat) And just for the record: they LOVE me.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He strides into the night, leaving Sue alone.  A dark nig The Fantastic Four is no more.  The family is split apart

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The transformation chamber is up and running.  Numbers co down.  The storm swirls in the chamber.  Reed now wears t UNIFORM.  He opens the door:

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Victor sits enthralled.  He leans forward, breathless.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Reed gets closer.  His heart races.  So does Victor's.  A moment of truth for both of them.  REED STEPS INTO THE MACHINE. Reed looks up at the cosmic storm.  He opens his arms, re to risk his life.  And...WHHHM!  He JOLTS in JUMP-CUT-MOT RECONFIGURING, JERKING out of control, and we CUT TO --

dialogues.speaker: VICTOR'S OFFICE
dialogues.text: His screens GO BLACK.  He looks out the window to see...a flash atop the BAXTER BUILDING.  The tip of the Baxter gl The rest of its lights GO OUT, FLICKERING in a power surg

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Lights go haywire.  Sue knows immediately...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh god, Reed.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Lights flicker in darkness.  The door rips open.  Sue lun inside.  She sees through smoke and sparks...REED sways i the chamber.  A beat.  Did it work?  Then... Reed SLUMPS TO THE GROUND.  His eyes flutter back.  Dead. His body is warped, twisted -- one half remains tense, ha while the other half is loose, soft, almost melted.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What did you do, Reed?  What did you do?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Victor watches every second on his monitors.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sue struggles to lift Reed -- half of his body is STRETCH OUT, devoid of any semblance of bone structure.  One side his face looks like it's MELTING OFF.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I can...make it work.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Reed, stop, you need to rest your --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The power...I need...more power...to control...the storm --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You need a doctor.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Reed loses consciousness.  Sue carries him out.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Victor watches, his eyes narrow, looking at his hands.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: More power...?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He reaches out for his phone, and...his SPEAKERPHONE AUTOMATICALLY TURNS ON.  His powers growing.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Leonard.  Bring me our lab rat.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ben sits alone, looking at city lights.  A man without a home.  Without a family.  A hard beat.  HEADLIGHTS slash across Ben.  He slowly turns, blinded in the lights of... LIMO.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ben!  They need you back at the Baxter building.  It's...Reed.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ben considers.  Despite it all, he's a good friend.  And good man.  As he gets into the car, we hear THROBBING MUS

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: LOUD MUSIC and PULSATING LIGHTS.  A young crowd dances an grinds to the beat.  Among the colorful lights, STREAKS O FLAME swirl around the ceiling.  We follow them to: A BALCONY, where we see JOHNNY sitting in a cozy VIP sect He's surrounded by "groupies" climbing over each other to a look at his various parlour tricks. He leans closer to a YOUNG WOMAN.  Closer.  Candles aroun them start to melt.  Beads of sweat drip down her face.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What do you say we get out of here?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She pauses.  And...a very LARGE MAN steps up.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: This your boyfriend?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Boyfriend doesn't look too happy.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Is that all you do?  Bar tricks and stealing chicks...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Johnny does one more trick...taps the guy's drink...ignit it into a burst of flame.  The Boyfriend drops the glass, which SMASHES on the ground...catches the floor on fire. The boyfriend quickly moves in and stamps it out.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What are you doing?!  You could have burned somebody!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The boyfriend takes his girlfriend's hand, they start to off.  She turns back for one last comment...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You know, if I had your power I'd be doing something with it, not wasting my time doing cheap bar tricks, hitting on some other guy's girl.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Johnny looks a little embarrassed.  The couple leaves.  Johnny glances around.  His FANS look down, away.  He see how quickly they can turn.  The crowd parts slightly.  He looks very alone.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Leonard leads The Thing inside.  The ominous chamber sits with its door open.  Victor enters from the control stati

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ben, come in.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What is this?  Where's Reed?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Where do you think?  With Sue.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ben looks at the flickering lights.  Suspicious.  Victor turns to Leonard, who looks a little scared by this dark room.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (quiet) I'll take it from here, Leonard.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Leonard nods, all too eager to get the hell out of here.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yes sir.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Leonard disappears fast, as Victor turns back to Ben.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What do you want, Vic?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: To help you.  I've run every test known to man.  And they all yield the same result: the machine is ready.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ben shakes his head, wanting to believe, but...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Reed said it'd be weeks till --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He also said we'd avoid that storm in space.  And we know how that turned out.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ben nods.  Reed was wrong before.  Ben gets closer to the machine, drawn to it.  He wants to believe, so badly.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He couldn't generate enough power for the machine to reach critical mass.  Yet another mistake for "Mr. Fantastic."

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: And you can?  Power it up?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Victor stands in shadows, but we see the tiniest little S around him.  The lights...?  Or his skin...?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yes.  I've found a new energy source.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He keeps his arm behind his back -- his fingertips course with ELECTRICITY.  It starts to build, sparking up his ar

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Tell me...do you want to be Ben Grimm again?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ben keeps his eyes on the machine.  His dream is alive.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Let's do it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The chamber doors open.  Thing enters.  He looks around t sterile box.  An animal in a cage.  Victor pushes a contr the doors of the chamber slowly close and seal.  Thing sh his eyes.  He just wants to be Ben again. FROM THE CONTROLS: Victor initiates the transformation sequence.  As lights go on inside the chamber, they dim i the lab.  Energy pumps into the chamber.  The storm swirl faster.  Lights flicker...there's not enough power, until -- Victor walks over...grabs hold of the machine with bot hands...and WHHHM!  A countdown begins in the control pan SLOW MOVE IN on the chamber, The Thing's face in the wind The chamber activates.  The storm strikes hard. The Thing opens his mouth, a beat, then he screams in ago Struggling violently inside.  To escape?  Extend the mome Condensation obscures the chamber window: The Thing vanis

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The city lights fill the sky, and give it a quiet, eerie glow.  Suddenly, a BRIGHT FLASH emerges from the window o the Baxter Building.  The rest of the city lights dim slightly.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Reed lies in bed, weak, recuperating.  When the power sur we MOVE in on him: he looks up in alarm, knowing that someone's using the chamber.  He starts to get out of bed straining to stand with every muscle left in his body.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sue sifts through a cabinet full of medications.  The lig dim.  Power failure.  She looks up...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Johnny walks alone.  A WAVE OF LIGHT spreads through the He looks up.  His eyes adjust to the blast, as he realize where it's coming from.  He starts RUNNING toward the Bax

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: INSIDE THE MACHINE, the RED CLOUD swirls with debris, crackling with light.  The chamber rattles dangerously, a the power seems to SHAKE the very foundation of the build And then it's over.  The light dies down...somewhat.  It still pulses along with the chamber.  The chamber door SL OPEN. Beat.  And...BEN GRIMM steps out.  Not The Thing.  No mor rocks.  BEN GRIMM.  Naked, tired, but finally A NORMAL MA He slips on his trench-coat -- now way too large.  He collapses.  He stares at his hands, his arms...it worked.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh my God... Th-thank you.  THANK YOU...VIC?!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ben sees a SPARK in shadows.  That spark is... VICTOR'S ARM.  Victor steps forward, and reveals himself Ben: ELECTRICITY PUMPS THROUGH HIS BODY.  His skin is par flesh, part metal.  Cheekbone exposed, steel tissue. HE IS DOOM.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Vic... What the...?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Everyone thought I was safe behind those shields...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Victor, the machine worked for me.  It can work for you --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It did, Ben.  It worked perfectly.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ben starts to realize...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You planned this...?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Doom smiles, reaches out his hand -- ELECTRICITY builds f his shoulders, coursing down his arms to his fingertips.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I've always wanted power.  Now I've got an unlimited supply...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: And no Thing to stand in your way.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: DOOM smiles, nods, stronger than Ben now.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Take a good look, Ben.  This is what a man looks like who embraces his destiny.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Doom clenches his fist and BLASTS Ben, sending him flying backwards across the room -- knocked unconscious.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: One down, three to go.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Suddenly, WHOOSH!  The lab door flies open.  Reed enters. Doom steps back into the shadows.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Right on cue.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Reed's eyes go wide.  He sees Ben crumpled in the corner.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh god Ben.  Are you okay? (amazed) You did it, you really did it...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No, Reed.  I did.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Reed slowly turns to see...DOOM.  His body, his face.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Victor...?  What, what happened to you?  What did you do to your --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Exactly what I said I would: I built a better, stronger being.  And outsmarted the great Reed Richards --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Victor, this isn't the way to --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (a dark smile) You always know best.  So tell me.  What happens when you superheat rubber?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Doom BLASTS an electrical BOLT at Reed, KNOCKING Reed thr the huge window!  Reed's body RUBBER-BANDS from the blast

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Reed SLINKIES down the face of the building, skin ripplin

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Doom looks out the window, smiling at his old friend's fa

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: DING!  The elevator opens.  Doom strides out.  He passes friend O'HOOLIHAN, who looks scared.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Mr. Von Doom?  Are you oka--

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Doom casually SWIPES, sending him through revolving doors

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Never better, Jimmy.  And it's Doctor Doom now.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Reed MELTS down the sides of an AWNING, like a Salvador D watch.  He tries to GRAB HOLD of window ledges, but he ca get a grip.  His ARM streeetches, and SNAP!  He falls lik SLINKY, out of control.  Half his body loose, half hard. He drips to the sidewalk, where...Doom steps out.  He cat Reed's face, holds it close.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Why the long face?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Doom whips Reed into the night.  As Doom turns, people co horrified by his face.  They clear out, and... Doom sees his REFLECTION in a window: scarred skin, metal veins.  A monster.  Infuriated, he SHATTERS the window wi an iron fist, and bounds into the night.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Smoke billows, windows are shattered.  Sue races inside, seeing Doom's devastation.  Silence, deadly silence.  Then...she sees a pile of WRECKAGE shift.  BEN crawls out

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ben?!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She helps him out of the rubble.  He is beaten, battered.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sue!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Johnny comes running in.  He sees the wreckage.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm sorry, sis, for leaving you guys --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No, I'm sorry, for pushing you out.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He nods.  A beat between them.  He looks around, sees Ben

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jesus, Ben! (eyeing him) I go away, look what happens.  You got a lot of explaining to do.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He motions to the wreckage.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (struggling, weak) The machine works.  And Vic's gone Mister Hyde on us --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Really?  With a name like Von Doom?  Never saw that one coming.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sue looks around.  Only one question.  Dead serious:

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Where is Reed?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Victor must've taken him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Doom sits at the head of the table in an eerie parallel t the opening scene.  Those mysterious CRATES loom in shado He wears a green HOOD, and METAL MASK over his scarred fa Doom's eyes turn toward...the other end of the table.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Chemistry 101, Part Two.  What happens to rubber when it's super- cooled?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We now see what he sees: Reed sits in a chair with TUBES INJECTED into his skin FREEZING HIM SOLID!  Ultra-cold va coats him.  Doom steps closer, a sadistic smile. Reed tries to move but can't even ball his hand into a fi

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Allow me.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He PRESSES DOWN on one of Reed's fingers, which makes a horrific CRACKING SOUND.  Reed's face twists with pain.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Painful...?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Doom seems to enjoy every CRACK.  He leans closer.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You don't know the meaning of the word.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Doom lets up on Reed and reaches into a crate, and pulls a military-issue ROCKET-LAUNCHER.  He aims at the city skyline, locking onto his target: JOHNNY STORM.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: But you will.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Johnny's HEAT SIGNATURE glows.  The screen flashes: TARGE ACQUIRED.  Doom looks back at Reed, his launcher aimed casually over his shoulder.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Flame off.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: BOOOOM!  He fires without looking!  A MISSILE blasts into sky.  THE MISSILE LIGHTS UP THE DARK NIGHT beginning its turn towards its target.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Johnny, Ben, and Sue hear the missile being fired and tur the window -- it BANKS, coming STRAIGHT for them.  They m to --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Johnny rushes toward the edge, to get a good look at the missile streaking closer.  As he moves, the missile SHIFT slightly with HIS MOTION!  His eyes narrow, thinking. He FLAMES ON a HAND.  He waves his flaming hand, and the MISSILE locks onto the fire!  Johnny darkens, realizing..

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Great.  Heat-seeker.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: His mind races.  He makes a decision, and steps up onto t ledge, hundreds of feet above the street.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What are you doing --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sis.  Let me take care of you for once.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: But Johnny...you can't fly.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Johnny considers, a half-beat.  He looks out.  Under brea

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Well then this'll be one hell of a basejump.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sue reaches out to stop him, but Johnny DIVES HEROICALLY THE EDGE!  He FLAMES ON!  The missile follows his arc.  A drops, his clothes BURN OFF, revealing his UNIFORM.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (under breath) Come on...come on...come on...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He falls lower, lower.  And...he...BANKS!  SWOOPS UP!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: FLAME ON.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sue watches, with fear, and a hint of pride.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We need to help Reed --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sue shakes her head, sympathetic.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ben, you got what we all wanted.  You need to stay here.  It's too dangerous.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She heads off.  Ben watches her go, helpless.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ben steps back into this ravaged room.  Through the shatt window, he sees Johnny's FLAMES streaking away.  A hard b

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What...what have I done?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Johnny zigs and zags, but the missile takes every twist a turn, gaining on him, bearing down.  Cars slow, stop.  Mo people look up, scared, pointing at this stunning sight.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Eerily silent.  Reed tries to move, but he is FROZEN.  He hears a footstep.  But the room is EMPTY.  No sign of Doo even.  A beat.  He hears a CREAK.  Another CREAK, closer. And... A FREEZING TUBE starts to SHIFT.  It goes taut, clearly b manipulated by a hand -- an INVISIBLE HAND.  Sue APPEARS to Reed, tube in hand.  She tries to stay calm.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What has he done to you?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Reed's eyes shift to see...Doom emerge from the darkness.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: How romantic.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Victor, please --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's Doctor Doom to you.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He steps closer.  Electrodes course over his metal skin.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We know the machine works.  It worked on Ben, it'll work on you.  We can turn you back --

dialogues.text: From their vantage point, they see the missile explode.  Flames dance. Sue's eyes darken, as Doom grips her neck. Reed tries desperately to move, but he is FROZEN.  It tak every last ounce of strength to lift one finger, which ma a CRACCCKKKKING sound.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: One more down.  Now it's just the scientist and his specimen.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sue and Reed lock eyes.  Reed tries to move his mouth.  H has something to tell her, struggling just to move his li and get the words out.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sue.  The only thing I ever knew without thinking was... (his lips fully freezing) I...love...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He starts to say "you," but his lips FREEZE, mid-word.  S whispers to him:

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Me too, Reed.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Doom steps toward Sue, about to deliver the final blow.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (quiet, cruel) And so four became none.  It's my time now.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: BOOOOM!  An elevator DOOR FLIES INTO THE ROOM!  SMASH!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Actually, Vic...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown

dialogues.speaker: Unknown

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Doom turns, just as -- BAM!  Ben HITS Doom harder than any living thing has ever been hit.  The force sends Doom back through the air, tow the far wall, where he SMASHES into the massive "V" sculpture.  It SNAPS, crashing onto him.  A few sparks. nothing. Nothing at all.  No more movement.  Doom is dead. Ben turns to Reed.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Damn, I've been wanting to do that.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Reed manages the thinnest smile as Ben starts disconnecti the tubes from Reed.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (Reed's words) Victor's "not that bad," huh?  Just "a little larger than life"?  Maybe you'll listen to me next time before --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: WHMM!  The WRECKAGE shifts.  They turn to see...Doom EMER He stands, power coursing.  And he CHARGES at Ben!  Ben charges back.  And these two behemoths...

dialogues.text: A HOTEL GUEST sees water FLOOD into the hall.  Roaring ra head straight for him.  He jams his key into the lock, turning desperately, just barely leaping out of the way a the wave carrying BEN and DOOM SMASHES through a window t

Doom steps out of the garbage truck, wat flooding the street around him.  COP CARS converge on Doo Doom turns his attention to the cops.  His limbs SPARK wi electricity, ready to fire at the cars.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ben sees the cops and Doom.  He knows the cops are dead m He turns to the OLD LADY in the driver's seat.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Excuse me, Maam.  Can I borrow your car?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She nods and quickly gets out, shaking.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The clutch sticks a little.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Not gonna be a problem.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I can't let you do that.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Simple, strong.  Doom turns to see...REED.  Alone.  Bruis and battered.  Slowly stepping toward him.  Doom smiles.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: And you can't stop me.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He turns back to Ben, raises the pole, but...he CAN'T SWI DOWN!  Something is HOLDING the pole in mid-air. Something invisible.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hello Susan.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She turns VISIBLE, holding back the pole with a FORCEFIEL Using her power, she FLINGS the pole from Doom's grip.  I skids along the street.  Reed helps Ben to his feet. Doom turns to these three wounded soldiers.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What is this?  The pitiful three?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Doom steps toward them, but --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Four.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: WHOOOSH!  Johnny SWOOPS DOWN, hurling a FIREBALL like a flamethrower, KNOCKING Doom back. Johnny takes his place alongside the others.  The four of them stand as one.  Johnny turns to Thing.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Had a little relapse, huh?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Thing starts to retort, but Johnny gives a warm smile.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Welcome back.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They turn to Doom, who stands with metal skin slightly si and melted, making him look all the more menacing.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: This is going to be fun.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: JOHNNY!  SPOT-WELD!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown

dialogues.text: (quiet, smiling) Flame on, kid.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown

dialogues.text: She concentrates.  She sees Johnny holding onto Doom -- a the GROWING HEAT and LIGHT. Sue shuts her eyes.  A GIANT FORCE FIELD EXPLODES FROM HE BODY.  A massive WAVE OF ENERGY. Her force field fades.  The light flickers out. everyone's eyes adjust, we hear...THUD.  THUD.  And -- DOOM steps through the smoke.  Unharmed.  His metallic bo GLOWS WHITE, TRAILING MOLTEN METAL.  Sue, Ben, Johnny loo devastated.  They can't beat him.  He looks at Reed.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Is that the best you can do...?  A little heat...?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Damn, I love this job.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Job, huh...?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Will they accept their mantle?  Reed shrugs.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Well, we do have the suits...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They give weary smiles.  A team.  Sue gets close to Reed.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You know, about what we said up there, I think maybe --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: THHM!  He KISSES HER.  His neck extending.  Strong, power He pulls back slightly, smiles at her.  A new strength in him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Funny how things turn out, isn't it?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sue looks at Reed.  A long way from that conference room.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hilarious.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown

dialogues.text: Dude, that's still my sister.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown

dialogues.speaker: Unknown

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yes.

dialogues.text: Reed goes to kiss her.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That's my nose, genius... These are my lips.
